data_processing_submit_job_description_1: OVH Analytics Data Compute lets you run Spark job on-demand with a customizable amount of vCPU cores and RAM.
data_processing_submit_job_description_2: Upload your code as JAR or Python files to an Object Storage container, and run it using the interface below.
data_processing_submit_job_description_3: During your job execution you will get access to live logs and metrics.
data_processing_submit_job_error_label: Aww snap ! An error occurred, we could not submit your job right now.
data_processing_submit_job_error_message: Input error: the requested job type isn't supported
Input error: the requested engine version isn't supported
Input error: the requested region isn't supported
Input error: the main class for your job must be specified
Input error: the requested worker memory is too big
Input error: the requested worker memory is too small
Input error: the requested driver memory is too big
Input error: the requested driver memory is too small
Input error: the requested worker memory overhead is too big
Input error: the requested worker memory overhead is too small
Input error: the requested driver memory overhead is too big
Input error: the requested driver memory overhead is too small
Input error: the sum of the requested worker memory and memory overhead is too big
Input error: the sum of the requested driver memory and memory overhead is too big
Insufficient Quota: the quota for your Public Cloud project is insufficient. Please, go to the following page to manage your Public Cloud quota
Input error: The requested file couldn't be found in the specified Object Storage container
Input error: The Conda environment couldn't be found in the specified Object Storage container
